item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

Until President Kennedy was killed, it wasn’t a federal crime to assassinate the President.

:eek:

I like the clean layout, but in my opinion the font is a little too bold for the size.

Button and rollover effects are nice though.

item.title: From My Website: Random Fact Generator - HTML
item.dc:creator: @S_ms S!ms
item.description:
@S_ms wrote:

Your rollover is just… huge.

Try to make an image with the normal on top and the rollover on bottom. Then use this.

.rollover { background-image: url(blah.jpg); } .rollover:hover{ background-position: 200px /* if the image is 200, 400px total */ }

works perfectly <3

Read full topic
